children.name: galerie_shape_basic
children.description: Gallery of basic shapes: rectangles, circles, lines, polygons and more.

children.name: galerie_shape_diagram
children.description: Diagram elements: pie charts, sparklines, bar charts for data visualization.

children.name: galerie_shape_analog
children.description: Analog components: resistors, capacitors, LEDs for circuit diagrams.

children.name: galerie_shape_widget
children.description: Interactive widgets: sliders, buttons, and form elements.

children.name: galerie_shape_icon
children.description: Vector icons collection for use in diagrams and flowcharts.

children.name: galerie_shape_node
children.description: Base shapes with ports (visible or hidden) - the foundation for any shape that can have connections.

children.name: galerie_shape_note
children.description: Note shapes: PostIt for sticky notes, Markdown for rich text annotations.

children.name: policy_selectionmenu
children.description: HTML overlay menu appears when a figure is selected. Demonstrates how to position HTML elements relative to canvas figures, handling scroll, zoom, and drag events.

children.name: galerie_box
children.description: New layout system: VBox, HBox, and GridBox for automatic child positioning.

children.name: box_collapsible
children.description: Expandable/collapsible container using VBox and HBox layouts.

children.name: box_tablelayout
children.description: VBox/HBox that automatically calculates and adapts to children's size constraints (min/max width/height).

children.name: box_zoom_stack
children.description: StackBox that switches visible layer based on zoom level.

children.name: box_mixed_layout
children.description: Combine different figure types (icons, labels, shapes) in nested VBox/HBox layouts.

children.name: box_db
children.description: Database table with dynamic rows and ports using VBox layout.

children.name: box_gridbox
children.description: CSS Grid-like 2D layout with flexible column/row definitions: '100px' (fixed), 'pref' (content size), 'grow' (fill available). Supports colspan, rowspan, and cell alignment.

children.name: box_tablebox
children.description: Simple table layout with addRow(...) API. Strings auto-convert to Labels. Supports mixed content (Labels, Icons), auto column sizing, and cellPadding. Ideal for key-value displays.

children.name: composite_raft
children.description: Soft grouping - figures on the 'raft' move together when dragged, but can be freely removed. Loosely coupled container.

children.name: composite_group
children.description: Transparent group container for organizing related figures.

children.name: composite_jailhouse
children.description: Strong grouping - figures placed inside are trapped and move together. Cannot be dragged out once added.

children.name: shape_custom_simple
children.description: How to create a custom vector shape from scratch.

children.name: shape_custom_timer
children.description: Custom label with internal timer that auto-updates its text every 500ms using the onTimer() callback.

children.name: shape_custom_timer_rotate
children.description: Custom label with timer that continuously rotates using setRotationAngle(). IMPORTANT: Rotation works best with basic shapes (Label, Rectangle, Circle). For shapes with ports, rotation may cause connection routing issues.

children.name: shape_custom_timer_edge
children.description: SetFigure with rotating line following rectangle edge using draw2d.geo utilities.

children.name: shape_decoration
children.description: Add child figures (labels, icons) to shapes using figure.add() API. Demonstrates various locator types: TopLocator, LeftLocator, RightLocator, DraggableLocator. Parallel concept to connection_decoration.

children.name: connection_with_contextmenu
children.description: Custom connection class with right-click context menu.

children.name: shape_db
children.description: Database table with add/remove row functionality and dynamic ports.

children.name: shape_collapsible
children.description: Shape that can expand/collapse to show/hide details.

children.name: shape_zoom_stack
children.description: Different visual representation at different zoom levels.

children.name: shape_zoom_svg
children.description: SVG content changes based on canvas zoom level.

children.name: shape_tablelayout
children.description: Grid-based layout for positioning child figures in cells.

children.name: shape_custom_tooltip
children.description: Custom tooltip implementation without external libraries. Shows how to create figure-specific tooltips.

children.name: interaction_dblclick_hardcoded
children.description: Handle double-click events directly in figure class by overriding onDoubleClick() method. Tightly coupled approach - behavior is built into the figure.

children.name: interaction_dblclick_plugable
children.description: Handle double-click events using a plugable Canvas Policy. Loosely coupled approach - behavior can be added/removed at runtime. Supports Undo/Redo via Command Pattern.

children.name: interaction_labeledit_inplace
children.description: Edit labels directly on the canvas with double-click.

children.name: interaction_click
children.description: Click events combined with animated sparkline charts.

children.name: interaction_slider
children.description: Connect slider input to animated sparkline output.

children.name: interaction_pie
children.description: Three sliders controlling pie chart segment sizes.

children.name: connection_labeledit_dialog
children.description: Edit connection labels using a popup dialog.

children.name: connection_labeledit_inplace
children.description: Edit connection labels directly on the canvas.

children.name: interaction_toFront
children.description: Clicked figure moves to front of Z-order.

children.name: interaction_draggable_decoration
children.description: Decorations that can be repositioned via drag&drop.

children.name: interaction_drag_copy_between_canvas
children.description: Drag and drop figures between two separate canvas instances. Hold SHIFT while dragging to copy instead of move. Visual distinction through Grid (Canvas 1) and Dot (Canvas 2) backgrounds.

children.name: resizehandle_replace_global
children.description: Replace default resize handles with custom shapes.

children.name: resizehandle_styled_css
children.description: Style resize handle appearance using CSS rules.

children.name: port_semantic_group
children.description: Only ports in the same semantic group can connect.

children.name: port_locator
children.description: Place ports at specific positions using locators.

children.name: port_serialize
children.description: Save and restore port configurations via JSON.

children.name: port_decoration
children.description: Ports with visual config panel for default values.

children.name: port_hide
children.description: Automatically hide connected ports, show on disconnect.

children.name: buildin_commandstack
children.description: Built-in command stack for undo/redo operations.

children.name: buildin_zoom
children.description: Canvas zoom in/out functionality with slider control.

children.name: buildin_event
children.description: Listen to canvas events: add, remove, select, zoom, clear.

children.name: databinding_watchjs
children.description: Two-way data binding using Watch.JS library.

children.name: databinding_backbone
children.description: Data binding with Backbone.js models.

children.name: databinding_backbone_modelbinder
children.description: Enhanced Backbone binding with ModelBinder plugin.

children.name: databinding_js
children.description: Simple property view with pure JavaScript binding.

children.name: databinding_rivets
children.description: Declarative data binding using Rivets.js.

children.name: policy_canvas_decoration
children.description: Control port visibility with canvas decoration policies.

children.name: policy_selection_handling
children.description: Different selection policies: single, multi, panning.

children.name: policy_selection_feedback
children.description: Customize visual feedback when figures are selected.

children.name: policy_snap_to
children.description: Snap figures to grid or other figure edges during drag.

children.name: policy_selectionmenu
children.description: Custom SelectionPolicy that displays a flyout menu when figure is selected. Shows how to extend SelectionPolicy, handle onSelect/onUnselect/onDrag events, and maintain overlay position during zoom.

children.name: policy_figure_constraint
children.description: Constrain drag movement: horizontal, vertical, or bounded.

children.name: policy_drag_copy
children.description: Hold [Shift] while dragging to copy instead of move.

children.name: io_json_basic
children.description: Load and save canvas content as JSON.

children.name: io_json_extend
children.description: Save custom figure attributes to JSON.

children.name: io_json_connections
children.description: Load/save diagrams including all connections.

children.name: io_json_dyn_labels
children.description: Save figures with variable number of child labels.

children.name: io_svg_basic
children.description: Export canvas to SVG for Inkscape or other editors.

children.name: io_json_multi_document
children.description: Merge multiple JSON files into one canvas.

children.name: io_png_overview
children.description: Export canvas as PNG image with preview.

children.name: io_png_crop
children.description: Export only the area containing figures to PNG.

children.name: connection_drop
children.description: Drop a figure onto a connection to insert it inline.

children.name: connection_vertex
children.description: Add, remove, or drag connection vertices interactively.

children.name: connection_locator
children.description: Attach labels at specific positions along connections.

children.name: connection_custom_labeld
children.description: Create a custom Connection class with built-in label using ManhattanMidpointLocator. Demonstrates how to add child shapes (Gear icons) to figures and handle click events on parent and child shapes.

children.name: connection_locator_midpoint
children.description: ParallelMidpointLocator keeps labels always readable (never upside down). Label rotates parallel to connection and displays current angle using getAngle() API. Demonstrates dynamic label updates via 'routed' event.

children.name: connection_decoration
children.description: Arrow, diamond, circle decorations at connection endpoints.

children.name: connection_with_contextmenu
children.description: Custom connection with right-click context menu.

children.name: connection_router
children.description: Different routing algorithms: direct, manhattan, spline.

children.name: connection_rubberband
children.description: Custom router with elastic rubber band behavior.

children.name: connection_segment_handling
children.description: Right-click to add or remove connection segments.

children.name: connection_bridge
children.description: Automatic bridge rendering at connection crossings.

children.name: connection_anchor_chopbox
children.description: Connect to figure bounding box instead of fixed ports.

children.name: connection_anchor_fan
children.description: Multiple parallel connections using FanConnectionAnchor.
